text: Mulan is a 2020 American action fantasy movie that is a remake to the 1998 animated movie of the same name. It was released on Disney+ on June 2020. It had bad reviews compared to the animated original movie. ==Cast== *Liu Yifei as Mulan Fa *Jet Li as The Empire *Jason Scott Leeas Shun YU (Villan) *Donnie Yen as General Li * Youson An as Li Shang ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:2020 action movies Category:2020 adventure movies Category:2020 fantasy movies Category:2020s war movies Category:Disney movie remakes Category:Movies set in China Category:Movies set in palaces Category:Mulan (Disney) Category:2020s American action movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:American war movies Category:Movies directed by Niki Caro Category:Period action movies Category:Disney+ movies
title: Mulan (2020 movie)
